headline: A Look At MGM Resorts (MGM) Valuation As Solar Power Deal Expands Renewable Energy Capacity
summary: MGM Resorts International (MGM) is drawing attention after beginning to source 115 megawatts of solar power and 400 megawatt-hours of battery storage from Nevada’s Escape Solar and Storage Project to cover its Las Vegas Strip daytime electricity needs. See our latest analysis for MGM Resorts International. The clean energy move comes as MGM’s share price trades at $33.34, with a 90 day share price return of 4.09% but a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 3.50%, suggesting recent...
